title: 05/03/2021 DPS Hour 2 Mike Heller
itunes:title: 05/03/2021 DPS Hour 2 Mike Heller
description:
Wisconsin area radio host Mike Heller joins Dan to discuss the rift between Aaron Rodgers and the Packers. He says that the situation was personal for Rodgers while it was a business decision for the Packers

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
